description: Claude Code hooks for Linear TDD Workflow System - enforces quality gates and automation

git-commit.command: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm test
git-commit.description: Quality gates before commits - ensure lint, types, and tests pass

Bash(git push).command: git diff --exit-code || (echo 'âŒ Uncommitted changes detected. Commit or stash before pushing.' && exit 1)

Write.command: npm run format ${file} 2>/dev/null || true && npm run lint:fix ${file} 2>/dev/null || true
Write.description: Auto-format and fix linting after file writes

typescript_javascript.command: npm run lint:fix ${file} 2>/dev/null || echo 'Lint fix skipped'

python.command: ruff format ${file} 2>/dev/null && ruff check --fix ${file} 2>/dev/null || echo 'Ruff format skipped'

update_coverage.description: Update coverage badge after test runs

full_validation.command: npm run build && npm test && npm run security-scan

notes: Hooks enforce TDD workflow and code quality automatically
Pre-commit hooks are REQUIRED - they will block commits if quality gates fail
Post-write hooks are async and won't block workflow
To temporarily disable (emergency only): Set allow_override: true
All hook executions are logged to .claude/logs/hooks.log
